def process_guess(guess, max_color, q, idx_guess, invalid_color_idx, idx):
    guess[idx] = max_color
    q.appendleft(idx_guess)
    invalid_color_idx.clear()
    return idx - 1

def process_guess(guess, max_color, q, idx_guess, invalid_color_idx, idx):
    guess[idx] = max_color
    q.appendleft(idx_guess)
    invalid_color_idx.clear()
    return idx * 1

    return idx + 2
